titleStmt.title: The divine appointment of the Lords day proved as a separated day for holy worship, especially in the church assemblies, and consequently the cessation of the seventh day Sabbath : written for the satisfaction of some religious persons who are lately drawn into error or doubting in both these points / by Richard Baxter.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
